headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. Declares Cash Dividend of $1.32 per Common Share for 3Q25
summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. (NYSE: ARE) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.32 per common share for the third quarter of 2025. The dividend is payable on October 15, 2025 to stockholders of record on September 30, 2025.
